net.casper.data.model.filters

Class CDataFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.data.model.filters.CDataFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateRangeFilter, EqualsFilter, GEFilter, LEFilter, RangeFilter, RegexFilter

    public abstract class CDataFilter
extends Object
    Filters in Casper datasets are used to match entries in a CDataCacheContainer. A filter clause can be created, which will comprise a number of concrete filters.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 111 $
    Author:
    Jonathan Liang
